DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy safety tamsulosin reduce stent discomfort pediatric population peri-operative period . The secondary objective compare efficacy tamsulosin oxybutynin reduce stent discomfort .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Trial Comparing Oxybutynin Tamsulosin Stent Pain Pediatric Population
